ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He added, 'What is your business, messengers?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And asked them: "What matter, O angels, brings you here?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He added: "What is your errand O sent ones?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “And what is your next task, O the sent angels?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "What then is the business for which you have come, O messengers"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: What is your business then, O apostles?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'And what is your business, envoys?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: And afterward what is your business, O ye messengers (of Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he asked, "What then is your business, O messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: what is your errand, sent ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O messengers, what is now your errand?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Abraham said: "What then is the business on which ye (have come), O ye messengers (of Allah)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Ibrahim (Abraham) again] said: "What then is the business on which you have come, O Messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He asked: 'Messengers, what is your errand'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “So what is your business, O envoys?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:57] He said, ‘So what is your business, O you who have been sent [by God]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said to Gabriel and his aids: (And afterward what is your business) what is the matter, why did you come, you messengers (of Allah)?)
